title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 218: Featuring Jakub Voracek + Igor Eronko
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are in Philly and are joined by Jakub Voracek of the Flyers. Jakub joins to talk about growing up in the Czech, playing in Philly, and a little music talk as well. The boys are also joined by Igor Eronko who is a hockey reporter based out of Moscow. Igor joins to get to the bottom of the beef between Russia and Spittin' Chiclets and talk some Russian hockey. The guys also touch on the Don Cherry situation, Mitch Marner's injury and some other NHL news followed by Rear Admiral wrapping up the show with a Gambling Corner and a touching tribute to a fallen Firefighter.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
